name: Enemy Dead Ahead
description:
Title: Enemy Dead Ahead 

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Puzzle

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: Brave the high seas in this high-stakes variation of Battleship - you must enter in coordinates correctly or risk being put under the enemy's fire!

Instructions: Click the play button and once the main scene is loaded, start clicking tiles to spawn your ships and rotate if needed! After that, click on a tile to begin hunting the enemy and input the right coordinates when prompted.

Game Design Team

Sajid Rahman – Game Designer
